page.title: 08AN INTERVIEW
page.content: We interviewed a housewife ,who lives in Wootton St. Lawrence.She has lived in her house for 8 years,but in the village for 11 years .She said that the village hasn't changed at all.There are mostly younger families living in the village,but there are some old people.If they can't cope they have a homehelp. It is very quiet when it comes to seeing people.You can go for days without seeing anybody. The main road is very busy though.It is mainly used as a cut through to bigger towns .The only place where people can meet socially is at a club where they play badminton.The club meets every Tuesday. There is no Doctor, the nearest is in Oakley. There is a regular bus service twice a week.
